        public Recipe(java.lang.String name,
      Pantry ingredients,
      java.lang.String steps)
        Constructor. Generates the recipe ID internally.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the recipe
        ingredients - Actually a Pantry Class Object that is used as the list of ingredients
        steps - A string that outlines the steps required in cooking the recipe
